attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the 176 Labour MPs who voted against Jeremy Corbyn
attributes.background: In a country that needs to come together. There labour party has voted in a secret ballot,no confidence in Mr Corbyn. This has further destabilised the labour party, with many protesting by resigning, and underminding there party leader. This petition demonstrates the confidence we have in Mr Corbyn

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
